# VOXAM - AI Voice Examination Platform

## What is VOXAM?
VOXAM is an AI-powered educational platform that helps students learn through voice-based examinations. Instead of passive reading, students actively explain concepts to an AI tutor that listens, adapts, and provides instant feedback.

## Key Features
- **Voice Exams**: Real-time spoken Q&A with AI examiner
- **Document Upload**: Support for PDFs, textbooks, lecture notes
- **AI Question Generation**: Automatic creation of exam questions from uploaded materials
- **Chat Mode**: Text-based alternative for those who prefer typing
- **Instant Feedback**: Detailed correction reports after each session
- **Adaptive Difficulty**: Questions adjust based on student performance

## Target Users
- Medical students (anatomy, physiology, clinical viva)
- Engineering students (conceptual subjects)
- Law students (case analysis, moot court prep)
- High school students (all subjects)

## Technology
- Speech-to-Text: Deepgram Nova-3 (supports Indian languages: Tamil, Telugu, Kannada, etc.)
- AI Models: Google Gemini, OpenAI
- Real-time: LiveKit WebRTC
- Built with: Next.js, FastAPI, LangGraph
